synopsis.text: While wandering through a futuristic city teeming with robots, a young boy stumbles upon an unusual red robot in a shopping arcade. The robot, with a peculiar appetite for machines, grows larger as it consumes more, adding to its eccentric, makeshift tail. As the boy watches in fascination, the robot develops an unexpected bond with him, refusing to leave his side. This 13-minute short, titled Garakuta no Machi (Junk Town), marks the directorial debut of Itou Nobutake, offering a captivating glimpse into a world where robots and humans coexist, with one boy at the heart of an extraordinary friendship.
